Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
com.gameplay.GameEngine
public class GameEngine extends Object
GameEngine class that works as the controller for the game flow Manages the game stages and has the list for Player and Country objects: d_playerList: list of player objects d_countryList: list of country objects

    startup() method in charge of initiating the game taking no parameters Manages player creation and controls the first stage of the game managing the users input through the InputOutput class methods If the command given by the user is valid, Command class methods are called to determine either if the command adds or removes players On the other hand, if the command corresponds to assigning countries, the process is called as well as the loop method running the main stage of the game

      The game phase.

    • d_logbuffer

      public LogEntryBuffer d_logbuffer
      The log buffer that stores all log entries for the game. It is used to keep track of all actions and events that occur during the game.

      countryList - the country list

    • gameLoop

      public void gameLoop()
      startup() method in charge of initiating the game taking no parameters Manages player creation and controls the first stage of the game managing the users input through the InputOutput class methods If the command given by the user is valid, Command class methods are called to determine either if the command adds or removes players On the other hand, if the command corresponds to assigning countries, the process is called as well as the loop method running the main stage of the game

    • checkIssuable

      public boolean checkIssuable(Parsing l_parsing)
      Check if the command is issuable.
      Parameters:
      l_parsing - input parsed for usage
      Returns:
      boolean

    • saveGameState

      public void saveGameState(Parsing l_parsing)
      Saves the current game state to a JSON file. The filename is determined by the first argument in the provided Parsing object's argument array. The save file is created in the "src/main/java/com/GameFiles" directory.
      Parameters:
      l_parsing - a Parsing object that holds the command arguments; the first argument (obtained via d_argArr.getFirst()) should be the filename.

    • loadGameState

      public void loadGameState(Parsing l_parsing)
      Loads the game state from a JSON file. The filename is determined by the first argument in the provided Parsing object's argument array. The file is expected to be located in the "src/main/java/com/GameFiles" directory. Once loaded, the players list, countries list, and current phase in the GameEngine are updated with the loaded state.
      Parameters:
      l_parsing - a Parsing object that holds the command arguments; the first argument (obtained via d_argArr.getFirst()) should be the filename.

    • clearPlayerList

      public void clearPlayerList()
      Clear player list.

    • clearCountryList

      public void clearCountryList()
      Clear country list.
